title: Print, ""Real Cheap": Gayle Lewis Installation Invitation May 9, 1992", 1991–94
description:
Text imprinted on recto on blue ground: "May 9, 1992/ A.d. Gayle Lewis Presents/ a recent installation which/ investigates the substantial/ worth placed on/ unsubstantially/ mass-produced religious supplies./ One night only, beginning/ at 7:30 p.m. 7638 N. Pennsylvania Street/Across from Herron School of Art./ Telephone 925-3282." Imprinted on verso in blue: "Real Cheap."
"It is the crown of thorns..." imprinted in mustard yellow on verso four times beneath image of Christ wearing a crown of thorns (image derived from print by Boumard fils) repeated four times and arranged in pairs at top and in mirror-image below. Designed to be mailed, so dotted folding lines indicated in blue.

tombstone.epitaph: Print, ""Real Cheap": Gayle Lewis Installation Invitation May 9, 1992", 1991–94.Offset lithography on translucent paper. Gift of Mario Mirelez. 1994-125-12.
